message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $180. I believe it's a fair price considering its value.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $150. Would you be willing to sell it to me for that price?
I appreciate your interest, Bob.  While $180 represents its true value, I'm willing to come down to $165. This is my final offer.
I appreciate your willingness to come down to $165, but I'm still a bit short on budget. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle at $155?
